job_title: Anonymous Employee in San Antonio, TX
cons: a lot of turf guarding due to poor management

review_title: Worst Company I Every Worked For....
job_title: Admissions Representative in San Antonio, TX
pros: There are none. This company has literally no positive attributes.
cons:
No loyalty, terrible pay. Overtime pay is 1/2 time versus time and a half or even your regular rate. (You will be FORCED to work OT). No paid time off or vacation time.  You get treated horrifically.

The management of this "School" is a joke.

review_title: This place is a career nightmare.
cons: Management likes to micro-manage. They have core values posted on every wall, one of which is "Excellence" to remind everyone that they aren't ever good enough and will never meet their high standard. The CEO is vindictive, will fire anybody that stands in his way. Management expects you to work long hours without pay. The pay is low by industry standards.

job_title: Admissions Professional in San Antonio, TX
pros: They offered 100% tuition paid by the company and 50% off for your family.
cons: Lack of integrity. I was treated very poorly and treated like a salve. Worst work experience in my entire life.
